subcategory.name: Select Menus
subcategory.description: Select menus and dropdown examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS select menu components to add dropdowns for things like country selection, user roles, and filtering options in your application. These select components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
